# CUTSCENE::SET_PAD_CAN_SHAKE_DURING_CUTSCENE

## Summary
Lets the pad to be vibrated during a cutscene

## Parameters
* **BOOL** vibrate

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Toggles a value (bool) for cutscenes.
